title: Silver border
body: I Noticed that my friends were receiving their borders today, but i have not gotten mine

replies.body: It might be taking a little while for all of the ranked rewards to be delivered, but they *are* still in the process of being delivered. If you don't see yours in about a week or so, make sure to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look.
